text: Inside Daisy Clover is a 1965 American drama movie based on Gavin Lambert's 1963 novel of the same name, directed by Robert Mulligan and starring Natalie Wood. It follows a tomboy becoming a Hollywood actress and singer. == Cast == * Natalie Wood as Daisy Clover * Christopher Plummer as Raymond Swan (AKA "The Prince of Darkness") * Robert Redford as Wade Lewis * Ruth Gordon as Lucile Clover * Roddy McDowall as Walter Baines * Katharine Bard as Melora Swan * Peter Helm as Milton Hopwood * Betty Harford as Gloria Clover Goslett * John Hale as Harry Goslett * Harold Gould as Cop on Pier * Ottola Nesmith as Dolores * Edna Holland as Cynara ==References== Category:1965 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Robert Mulligan
title: Inside Daisy Clover
